Html:
Hi all,

I am trying to have Kigg 2.5 running properly on my development machine. (XP, VS 2008 and SQL 2005, using VS embeded web server )

I am able to create new stories.  :-)

 

Problem is that I am absolutely unable to edit them.  Unable to delete them.  Even unable to logout !  (I am logged in as admin)

I always receive the same error:  Microsoft JScript runtime error: Invalid procedure call or argument .  The debugger breaks at line 3, col 42009 of file asset.axd?name=js2&v=2.5.0.0    xhr.open(type,s.url,s.async)

Any idea ?

Why do'nt you try to debug step by step
Apparently you have a javascript error
I have some times this kind of error (Microsoft JScript runtime error)
I usually solve by just rerun the application

This error related to XHR that is used with OpenID. This will happen with embedded web server yes, but not with IIS. because Embedded web server doesn't have headers.

This is my evaluation to the problem as I got this before and with debugging I reached to the source of the problem which is the above.

Try to configure your IIS 5.5 on XP and use KiGG on it to overcome this issue
